instruction: Compose a paragraph describing a natural scense.
output: The morning was bright and sunny, with birds chirping in the trees and a light shimery glimmer reflecting off of the lake. The sky was deep blue, with only a few wispy streaks of white clouds scattered across the horizon. The trees were a deep, vibrant green with leaves rustling in the gentle breeze. Nature was coming alive and it was a beautiful sight to behold. A forest trail wound through the trees, and the smell of wildflowers and the warmth of the sun mixed in the air. It was a perfect morning to explore and discover the beauty of nature.
